body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Hotel Paradise customer service. My name is Frank Gonzales, how may I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Frank, my name is Catherine Hayes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Catherine! Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is catherine.hayes@example.com, and my phone number is eight seven six five five five four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Catherine. I have noted down your email as catherine.hayes@example.com and your phone number as eight seven six five five five four three two one. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I'm all good, thank you. I'm actually quite happy with the service provided.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear! We always strive to ensure our guests are satisfied. Thank you for choosing Hotel Paradise. If you have any further inquiries, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day, Catherine!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Frank. You too! Goodbye.
